copy_en: Connected locks allow users to control their home security via mobile phone applications, or web interfaces that connect to the installed lock. The use of this technology is challenging traditional notions of how we secure our home, and interact with the ecosystem inside.
copy_cat: Panys Connected permeten als usuaris controlar la seva seguretat per a la llar a través d'aplicacions per a telèfons mòbils , o interfícies web que es connecten al pany instal·lada. L'ús d'aquesta tecnologia és la noció tradicional desafiadors de com assegurem la nostra llar , i interactuar amb l'ecosistema en el seu interior .

copy_en: As part of an intelligent home heating system, web-enabled thermostats offer insights into energy use that could allow us to optimise energy consumption, and make our homes more comfortable.
copy_cat: Panys Connected permeten als usuaris controlar la seva seguretat per a la llar a través d'aplicacions per a telèfons mòbils , o interfícies web que es connecten al pany instal·lada. L'ús d'aquesta tecnologia és la noció tradicional desafiadors de com assegurem la nostra llar , i interactuar amb l'ecosistema en el seu interior .

copy_en: Home entertainment devices allow users to stream multimedia content, whether playing music, projecting games or watching films. These devices can enhance this multimedia experience, and open up new opportunities for collaboration.
copy_cat: Panys Connected permeten als usuaris controlar la seva seguretat per a la llar a través d'aplicacions per a telèfons mòbils , o interfícies web que es connecten al pany instal·lada. L'ús d'aquesta tecnologia és la noció tradicional desafiadors de com assegurem la nostra llar , i interactuar amb l'ecosistema en el seu interior .

copy_en: Hubs connect a series of programmable sensors to gather data, which can be interpreted to give insights into how we can optimise our daily routines.
copy_cat: Hubs connecten una sèrie de sensors programables per recopilar dades , que poden ser interpretades per donar una visió de com podem optimitzar les nostres rutines diàries .

copy_en: Fictional projects reflect on possible future scenarios, allowing us to consider the social and cultural implications of connected technologies.
copy_cat: Projectes de ficció reflexionar sobre els possibles escenaris futurs , el que ens permet considerar les implicacions socials i culturals de les tecnologies connectades .

copy_en: Digital art frames are platforms that allow art to be experienced at home. With the ability to show both static and moving artworks – fed from the internet and controlled via smartphone, tablet or computer – these platforms address how we preserve, collect and share art in the digital age.
copy_cat: Marcs digitals de l'art estan plataformes que permeten que l'art que es va experimentar a casa . Amb la capacitat de mostrar obres d'art tant estàtiques com en moviment - alimentat des d'Internet i controlat a través de smartphone , tablet o ordinador - aquestes plataformes aborden com preservem , recollim i compartim l'art en l'era digital .

copy_en: Car sharing services are transforming cities, improving people’s commute, and taking thousands of cars off the roads. It not only means better, more personalised service, it means a considerable reduction in the traffic congestion as well as noise and air pollution.

Connected bicycles, and the data that can be gathered from them, can help cyclists achieve better performance, increase safety, avoid injuries, and have more fun on the road. This new and sustainable form of transportation enhances rider mobility and experience, and allows people to track and share mapped rides and traffic data through a mobile app.

Plants care systems assess your plants’ needs and sends alerts to your smartphone, tablet or computer. The system uses sensors, a hub, internet connection and the Internet to collect and deliver real-time updates about your lawn, garden or houseplants. Plants owners are provided with detail care information regarding watering, fertilising, misting, temperature and light through mobile app notifications, text messages or emails.

Real time data platforms enable people to have more information to be better citizens and to learn more about the world around them as opposed to relying on connectivity to automate their lives. Using an open source website and mobile app, the platforms generate participatory processes of people in the city, creating more effective and optimised relationships between resources, technology, communities and services in the urban environments.

Open source kits are designed to seamlessly integrate hardware, software, and the internet. The Kits connect everyday objects with your digital life, and provide an easy way for users to learn about engineering, electronics, and everything in between. With this simple invention kits, artists, students, and inventors of all experience level can create computers, games, music, architectural models and more.
